title: Edit properties of a resource offering
content:
For more information about resource offerings, see Resource offerings for sequenced designs.

To edit the properties of a resource offering, in the resource offering's summary page, click the Properties tab. Click the gear icon for that property and choose Edit. Edit the property and click Save.


You can't edit the type or name of an existing property.

For descriptions of certain properties, see Create a resource offering.

Related topics

  • Create a resource offering
